channel.title: series on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in series on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 3.7 Of rain and coming home
item.description: 19th June 2013 The sound, smell and sight of a storm are reassuring and comforting to me. I sit here thousands of miles away listening to Ghanana ghanana from Lagaan for a moment transported to Bangalore.

item.title: A Brave New World of Equilibrium
item.description: The battle between emotion and control is an old one. It is fought by each of us in our lives as well as philosophers at a more conceptual level.
